title: Looking for a Ranked 5's team to stick with and climb
body:
Hey is im Looking for a ranked team, but not them teams were u play placements then everyone leaves. i want a team thats going to be active and has some kind of communication.
Currently Bronze 1, IGN: PG Pulse
My main roles are: Support/Jungle, i can also play a decent top lane.

replies.body: add me our team is semi serious we have been together for 3 months.
